Differentially Private Queries using Exp.use_case: Useful in settings where discrete outcomes are preferred while maintaining privacy.

Epsilon.description: Privacy budget controlling the randomness of the mechanism.

k.description: The number of top categories to return when using the top-k query.

Column 2.description: The second categorical column for generating contingency tables or comparing with another column.

Query.description: The query to be executed on the data.
